title: Do I pay zakat if I saved money to buy a house, for marriage, paying off loans etc?  Assim al hakeem
transcript: um Nia's question was about saving money to buy a house if the money reached a threshold and which definitely for buying a house it must have reached and exceeded that and it stayed with you for a whole lunar year whether it is for marriage buying a house paying off debts doing anything with it you have to give 2.5 percent as the cut if you want to not give the cat before the lunar year is complete 11 months and 25 days go and buy the house but as long as it's kept with you for one lunar year you have to give the cat for that
